name: Karthika Mohan
content: Karthika Mohan - Oregon State University Research Interests My research interests lie in the intersection of Artificial Intelligence and Causal Inference. My research agenda for the next decade is motivated by the belief that in order to bring machines closer to human levels of intelligence, machine learning algorithms need to deal with the causal component of human reasoning.
